parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate.  The event is a discussion on social media and violence, not related to any specific candidate or party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, promoting an event open to the public.  The reach estimate indicates a wide potential audience (100K-500K).</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to promote a public discussion on social media and violence. There is no indication that the event aims to influence voting patterns in the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The event description suggests a journalistic approach, aiming to explore a topic of public interest through a discussion involving a journalist and an expert in criminology. The intention appears to be educational and informative, not persuasive or promotional for any political candidate or party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions related to the parliamentary elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1088858292793978</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes a public discussion on social media and violence. The event is organized by Mathias Corvinus Collegium, and the speakers include a journalist and a criminology expert. The content is not directly related to the parliamentary elections, nor does it advocate for or against any candidate or party. The post's objective is to inform and educate the public on a relevant social issue, not to influence voting behavior.  While the post falls under the "POLITICAL" category due to the nature of the discussion topic, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post does not directly refer to any candidate, does not aim to influence the vote, and is not electoral propaganda in nature.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>MCC</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
